ingredients: +   1/2 cup shortening, 1 cup white sugar, 1  egg, 1 cup persimmon pulp, 1 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cloves,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 cup raisins,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts
